          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Vaccination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schutzimpfung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vaccination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vaccination</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vaccinazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμβολιασμός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vacunación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This box diagram shows how vaccination makes a person resist a bacteria like TB which gets in the body.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antibodies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vaccination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white blood cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Kastendiagramm zeigt, wie Schutzimpfung 
eine Person Bakterium widerstehen läßt wie TB, welches im Körper 
erhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme de cadre montre comment la 
vaccination incite une personne à résister à des bactéries comme 
TB ce qui obtient dans le corps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama da caixa mostra como o vaccination 
faz uma pessoa resistir as bactérias como TB qual começa no corpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema della casella mostra come la 
vaccinazione incita una persona a resistere ai batteri come TB quale 
ottiene nel corpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα κιβωτίων επιδεικνύει πώς ο 
εμβολιασμός κάνει ένα πρόσωπο να αντισταθεί στα βακτηρίδια όπως
τη φυματίωση που παίρνει στο σώμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama del rectángulo muestra cómo la 
vacunación hace que una persona resiste bacterias como TB cuál 
consigue en el cuerpo.</string>
          </description>
